p: Flame retardancy of PVC materials were investigated and the limiting oxygen index (LOI) value was showed in Fig. 5(d). The results showed that LOI value of PVC materials containing 50 wt% DOP was 23.6%. LOI value of PVC-C was 26.8%, the value for PVC-A reached 34.7% with more propargyl ether THEIC-MR-P grafted onto PVC chains, which illustrated that flame retardancy of internally plasticized PVC was improved.
